alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 1:44AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LYCOMING AND WESTERN SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM EDT... At 143 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montoursville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized flooding possible. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Montoursville, Kettle Creek Gorge, Muncy Valley, Lincoln Falls, Barbours, Shunk, Loyalsockville, Cogan Station, South Williamsport, Garden View, Picture Rocks, Forksville, Eagles Mere, Hillsgrove, Little League World Series Complex and Williamsport Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
